statements: DELETE FROM HedgeFundData WHERE strategy = 'Equity' AND manager_id = 500;
DELETE FROM hedge_funds WHERE fund_id = 100 AND total_assets > 100000.00;
DELETE FROM fund_data WHERE data_id IN (SELECT data_id FROM fund_data WHERE data_type = 'performance' AND data_value < 0.0);
DELETE FROM HedgeFundManagers WHERE experience_years < 5 AND performance_rating < 4.00;
DELETE FROM HedgeFundInvestors WHERE investor_id IN (SELECT investor_id FROM HedgeFundHoldings WHERE market_value < 1000);
DELETE FROM hedge_fund_positions WHERE account_id = 200 AND symbol = 'AAPL';
